Key Match Events: Jon Thorsteinsson scored the opening goal for Iceland with a low shot through the legs of John Stones
Cole Palmer was a livewire in the early stages but England struggled in the final third
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate named his 26-man squad on Thursday
Southgate emphasized the importance of controlling midfield possession
The match was seen as a final warm-up ahead of Euro 2024
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate called it 'a disjointed and disappointing performance'
Declan Rice stated that the result was 'not ideal' but highlighted positive aspects of the game
Anthony Gordon mentioned a lack of quality in the final third let them down
Miscellaneous Highlights: A goal from Jon Thorsteinsson gave Iceland a 1-0 win over England at Wembley
The match was part of England's final warm-up before Euro 2024
